reviews.review:
One of the best games I've ever played. Truly a unique style of game.
I usually don't care for any sort of "puzzle" type of game, but this game is a great mix of Action/Adventure/Puzzle with a hilarious background plot.
Some of the levels will make your brain hurt, but it's worth it!
A must play game.
I rate it 9.5/10
Стоит поиграть!!!
Good game with good story and remember "the cake is lie"
The storyline is quiet short and doesn't have mutiplayer mode, but it is still a good game.
The cake is a lie!!!!
I accidently beat this game in one sitting. Oops.

I really love this game and most people dont recommend this game because it is short or too easy, but, all-in-all it is a amazing game! P.S. No Wheatley so if you wanted this game because of that then sorry. No Wheatley.

Игрушка хорошая, для тех кто любит по размышлять над поставленными задачами.

На отлично проработана графическая составляющая игры, для тех времен). На не которых головоломках можно и застрять, а так они все легенькие. Порадовал голос помощник, так сказать тролит на всем протяжении игры. Вообще можете покупать игра хорошая. 10 из 10. :)

PROS : Jugabilidad, graficos, GLaDOS, precio.

CONTRAS : Es demasiado corto. Pero lo compensa con una serie de mapas avanzados y desafios.
A masterpiece. Well written, addicting, and most importantly, fun.
still alive!

流程很短，但带来的游戏体验却很棒。
传送门不损失能量的设定让人眼前一亮，第一次进行抛投的那种感觉真的是永远忘不了。
随着游戏关卡的进行，更多的技巧，更多的道具，更高的解谜难度慢慢展现在眼前，使玩家一直保持着合适的新奇感和过关后的成就感。
剧情方面，本来以为是纯粹的解密过关，在完成实验之后剧情却突然神展开，开始紧张刺激的逃亡，最后与GLaDOS决战，也是相当有意思。

建议通关后再过一遍开发者注释，跟随着制作人员的解说，能对游戏有更深入的了解，并且感受到制作的用心。

The game is good but It is not worth 10 euros. The story is short and too simple (it starts getting interesting in the sequel) and the levels are easy if compared to the one in Portal 2.
So, if you are a Portal 2 fan, and you are looking for a new adventure in the magic world of portals and you want to know more about the story, get portal 2  mods and read Lab rat (portal comic, you can find it on thinkwithportals.com) or wait until the next steam offers maybe you might get the chance to buy it for 75% less as happened to me few weeks ago :)

Excelente jogo. Bem desafiador, interessante e além de tudo, tem uma história correndo por traz de todos aqueles testes. O ponto fraco é que o game é muito curto, mas assim que você o termina, logo vem a vontade de jogar o segundo título. Recomendadíssimo.
2에비해 별로..

One of the most groundbreaking PC Classics of all time. If you HAVEN'T played this game yet, you seriously need to. It may be old(er), but it is so much fun over and over again. The mind-bending puzzles make this game the best of its kind. 10/10.

As a fan of the entire Half-Life series, I felt it was weird I had never played Portal. But I never looked into it due to the fact that I was always a huge FPS nut and I just couldn't see a puzzle/adventure game being that fun.

Boy, was I wrong. 

Though this first part is rather short, I really enjoyed the gameplay. But more than anything I loved the story.
GLaDoS is simply awesome, I spent most of the game snickering at it's hilarious dialogue as I tried to figure out what to do next. Which, FYI was always interesting and immersing!

TL:DR Incredibly fun game when you're looking for something where you have to use your brain to atleast a small extent to progress. And in the meantime you get to enjoy the awesome enviroment & witty comical relief that Portal has to offer!

If there was anything else I'd want different, I could only refer to the length of the game. I started last night, quit at test chamber 18, and then just finished the game up just now. 

But I'll definitely be getting Portal 2 to continue my journey deeper into aperture's mysteries!
★★★★★ charming 1st-person, 1-sitting puzzler

Portal is a very challenging game that makes you think really hard about the solution. It has unique and original puzzles revolving around the portal gun, cubes, sentries, and other obstacles. You can pick up sentries and cubes, and you can only place your portal on certain surfaces, but not on others.
All in all, my only complaint is that is was too short.

Sin duda un gran juego. Tanto el gameplay como las mecánicas están muy cuidados y resultan en una experiencia muy divertida. En cuanto a gráficos, pese al tiempo que ha pasado se sigue viendo genial. Personalmente, me gusta el diseño tan simple y limpio de las cámaras de pruebas. 

Lo recomiendo.

Dialogue is muffled and hard to hear

More of a tech demo than a game

Rating: 90%

É um jogo em primeira pessoa focado em puzzles. O player controla a protagonista, chamada Chell, que é submetida a uma série de testes de raciocínio promovidos por GLaDOS, inteligência artificial que controla o complexo da Aperture Science (ou parte dele). GLaDOS tem uma personalidade muito interessante e por várias vezes expressa sarcasmo e uma certa "raiva" em relação a Chell. 
A campanha é curta mas é divertida. O final do game é bastante interessante.
Além da Aperture Science, o jogo trás alguns outros elementos que o deixam inserido no universo da franquia Half Life.
O jogador não utiliza armas propriamente ditas, apenas a "portal gun", que cria portais que são utilizados para superar obstáculos e resolver os puzzles.
A jogabilidade é praticamente a mesma de Counter Strike, porém o personagem não corre. A dinâmica dos portais e a física do jogo são muito bons. 
Os gráficos são simples mas muito bonitos.
Recomendo este jogo para quem procura jogos com muitos puzzles e para os fãs da franquia Half Life.

This game was the first of it's kind in that it's a first person shooter where you don't actually shoot anything to kill it. Seriously, if you need to kill something, you don't shoot it, you shoot around it. The whole game is one challenging, yet do-able puzzle after another and each victory (No matter how small or unexpected) is completely satisfying.
Combine this fact with one of the greatest AI characters I have ever encountered, and you have what I consider to be one of my favourite video games.

不過2代就很長了 劇情也更好
我在特價時6.多鎂買下超值得

Created by Valve, Portal is a challenging yet fun puzzle game. Stuck in a test chamber with nothing but a strange AI speaking to you, this game incorperates the use of portals to make a great puzzle game! Although the story is not too present, the character (yes, I said CHARACTER, no plural, it's only you and GLaDOS) is very memorable with her sarcastic humor and  her dark ambition for science. The absence of any 'good' characters in the game makes you feel lonely and vulnerable, but it also can give you more determination to get out of this horrible testing area. The creators cleverly hid rooms filled with random sayings and paintings, which can make some (it made me!) paranoid, however I feel that it adds a good amount of uneasiness to the game. 
       If anyone is looking for a relatively short (it only took me about 2 1/2 hours) but engaging/entertaining puzzle game with a sense of unease and with a creepy atmosphere, this is the game for you!
Quick, fun game. It's not a long game, but it doesn't need to be.
Se te hace corto, pero, ¿y lo que mola matar a una IA avanzada con portales?
I don't think I need to write a review for this game beacuse everybody know it, its the best of the best, a pure gold classic what you must try if you never played it! :D
